byline.original: By C. BROOKS PETERS Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: German press and pub reaction to Greek victories
snippet: BERLIN, Nov. 30--The ill-starred military venture of the Italian Axis partner on the lower end of the Dalmatian Peninsula is a subject which just is not discussed in the German press....

headline.main: ITALIAN REVERSES CAUSE REICH WORRY; But the German People Are Confident Their Army Will Clean Up if Necessary

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Nov. 30--The ill-starred military venture of the Italian Axis partner on the lower end of the Dalmatian Peninsula is a subject which just is not discussed in the German press.
